Package com.xebisco.yield

Class NonFillShape

java.lang.Object
com.xebisco.yield.YldB
com.xebisco.yield.Component
com.xebisco.yield.SimpleRenderable
com.xebisco.yield.NonFillShape
All Implemented Interfaces:
Spacial
Direct Known Subclasses:
Line, Shape, Sprite, Text
public abstract class NonFillShape extends SimpleRenderable implements Spacial
It's a shape that can't be filled.
